cab.content: SECRET, -------General Headquarters,British Armies in France.19th Hay, 1918.No. 0.A.B./202.Sir,-I have the honour to forward herewith a report received from the G.0.C, Royal Air Force, on the bombing raid carried out by the OCHEY Squadrons on the 15th instant.I have the honour to be, Sir,Your obedient Servant,(Sd.) K. Wigram,B.G.,for FieId-Marshal,C orananding-in-Chief, British Armies in Prance.The Secretary, l"/ar Office,LONDON,'S.W.
